nodes.text: The Tatooine Agricultural Academy was an academy located on Tatooine, dedicated to teaching students about agriculture.

When Roan Novachez was rejected from Pilot Academy, he feared that he would be sent to this school, which he thought of as "Plant School." He was worried and upset, as he had always dreamed of becoming a starfighter pilot like his father and older brother, and any plant that he touched withered and died. He was relieved when he received a letter informing him that he had been accepted at the Jedi academy on Coruscant.
In his second year at Jedi academy, he again worried that he might be sent to this school after experiencing difficulties with his Star Pilot Flight Training course.
